list of all the songs of the playlist : Song

title: title of the song : string
artist: name of all the artistes  : string
infos: further informations  about the song, must be less than 140ch : string
tags: list of all the tag  for the song, optional : Tag

tags.type: text / timer (assumed text for retro compatibility): string
tags.time: unix timestamp to start the timer at, if type = timer: int
tags.text: label of the tag, must be as short as possible, use %TIME% to marque the timer location : string
tags.icon: URL of the icon to be displayed aside of the text, optional : string
tags.ariaLabel: description of the icon, option, must be set when using an icon (WCAG) : string
tags.color: background color of the tag in hex, optional : string
tags.fontColor: font color of the tag in hex, optional, must contrast enought to be read (WCAG) : string

requester.displayName: name of the chatter who've requested the song : string
requester.color: font color of the requester's name in hex : string
badges: list of all the badges to be displayed aside of the requester name, optional : Badges

badges.alttext: alternative text displayed if the image don't load or on hover : string
